publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3666 Ms Sandra White: Scottish Empowerment Awardsâ€”That the Parliament notes the recent Scottish Empowerment Awards which were held in Glasgow recently and organised by EMPOWER Scotland; congratulates all those involved with the organisation of the event and the valuable work of EMPOWER Scotland, and believes that it is important to highlight the enormous contribution being made to Scotland by the black and ethnic minority communities.
S2M-3666 Scottish Empowerment Awards (lodged on 1 December 2005) Christine Grahame*
S2M-3666 Scottish Empowerment Awards (lodged on 1 December 2005) Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3666 Scottish Empowerment Awards (lodged on 1 December 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3666 Scottish Empowerment Awards (lodged on 1 December 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3666 Scottish Empowerment Awards (lodged on 1 December 2005) Linda Fabiani*
